PackageInfo.name: Composite.Media.NivoSlider
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: Displays an image slider on a page using Nivo Silder (http://nivo.dev7studios.com) , a highly customizable plugin for jQuery.Displays an image slider on a page using Nivo Silder (http://nivo.dev7studios.com) , a highly customizable plugin for jQuery.
